description.en:
Lovely ♡ contains nine stories of busty tsunderes with slender legs and charming personalities. These flirty girls love to play with the guy closest to their heart, but love it even more when they get the tables turned on them, becoming their toy. Collecting ten chapters, Lovely ♡ is every bit the title claims to be!

(Source: fakku, edited)

1. Climax ♥ Miki-chan / Zetchou ♥ Miki-chan (絶頂♥ミキちゃん); Comic Bavel 2018-11
2. Kaede & Suzu / Kaede to Suzu (楓と鈴); Comic Bavel 2018-04, 2019-01
3. Kaede & Suzu 2 / Kaede to Suzu 2 (楓と鈴2); Comic Bavel 2018-04, 2019-01
4. Lovely Aina-chan ♥ (らぶりーあいなちゃん♥); Comic Bavel 2018-08
5. Hide & Seek / Kakurenbo (かくれんぼ); Comic Bavel 2018-06
6. Our First XX Date ♡ / Hajimete no XX Date ♡ (初めての××デート♡); Comic Bavel 2018-01
7. I Tied Up My Tsundere Girlfriend! / Tsundere Kanojo o Shibatte Mita! (ツンデレ彼女を縛ってみた！); Comic Bavel 2017-10
8. Silent Girlfriend / Mukuchi na Kanojo (無口な彼女); Comic Bavel 2017-08
9. I'm a Fake Slut Who Tried to be a Cocktease / Nise Bitch no Watashi ga Chouhatsu Shite Mita (偽ビッチの私が挑発してみた); Comic Bavel 2017-05
10. Maiden Breed (メイデンブリード); Comic Bavel 2016-10

Note: Chapter 10 is exclusively from the electronic version of Bavel Comics "Lovely ♡" that was released on December 21st, 2018.
